paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to propose and apply a verification and validation approach to Enterprise Modeling, that enables the user to improve the relevance and correctness, the suitability and coherence of a model by using properties specification and formal proof of properties. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A formal verification framework and associated tools for enterprise modeling: Application to UEML
